name: The Rat-Catcher
storyline: Team up with a Department of Menace Eradicator to find her missing partner! Collect bounties, interrogate rodents, and venture into the Prickfinger Wastes. Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and your pistol closest still.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for May, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Adorations.
